}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There would seem to be multiple versions of this device. This particular model (w/ grey casing) appears to be a '''Good Way''' hub.
"HU2140G2 VER:1.1" is silkscreened on the board. The hub is using multiple '''R.K.''' caps and all '''ACON''' USB connectors.
The power adapter included with the hub ''may'' be a '''DVE''' DSA-0151A-05A (100-120VAC 50/60Hz 0.4A -> 5VDC 2.4A).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
